title: The city of Wilmington has been collecting storm water fees for the last 4/5 years.  When will we see some drainage work done to correct some of the long term flooding areas such as Racine Dr by the apartments and New Center Dr near South College Rd?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. I believe this item from StarNewsOnline.com will answer your question: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090923/ARTICLES/909229951
